title: Marlie's Testimony
meta_content: Week long migraine headache? Don't be afraid to come to church, it might go away forever!
content:
I came to service Sunday with a bad migraine headache. It was horrible and I had had it for several days and almost didn't want to come to church. I came up for prayer. Pastor Tom had me sit down. He prayed for my legs to grow out. He prayed for my arms, back and head. I was healed! Praise God! Marlie
Reno, NV
